welcome.headline: AI-Enhanced Knowledge Management
welcome.lead: Build a searchable, linked, and semantically-rich knowledge base with hybrid search, W3C SKOS tagging, and automated NLP pipelines.
pillars: Hybrid search combining BM25 lexical and dense semantic retrieval with RRF fusion.
W3C SKOS-compliant tagging with strict isolation for multi-tenant data segregation.
AI revision pipeline with automatic linking, embedding, and title generation.
checklist: Start the API server and verify the health endpoint.
